#Instructions on how to access the ROLE ontology

= ROLE Ontology =

The current version of the ROLE ontology consists of 2 files:
  * tool-ontology.rdfs  https://role-project.svn.sourceforge.net/svnroot/role-project/trunk/model/tool-ontology.rdfs
  * learning-ontology.rdfs  https://role-project.svn.sourceforge.net/svnroot/role-project/trunk/model/learning-ontology.rdfs

A convenient way to browse the ontology:
http://pellet.owldl.com/owlsight/

Go to "File" - "Load ontology" and copy/paste the ontology URL.
